messages.title: A decade of delivering for Solihull
messages.content: Turn over to find out how Lorely & the Lib Dems want to continue to deliver for local people...

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Works to protect our green spaces
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lorely Burt has put efforts into protecting green spaces.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fights to save our Post Offices
keyPolicies.policyDescription: She has been fighting to save local Post Offices.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Saves St James' School in Shirley
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lorely Burt was involved in saving St James' School in Shirley.
She has contributed to winning a decent pension for carers.
Lorely Burt was named FSB Small Business Champion.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Wins extra money for local schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: She has successfully obtained additional funding for local schools.
She played a role in saving the Solihull Walk-in Centre.
Lorely Burt has been instrumental in winning free school meals.
She has helped to deliver a record rise in pensions.
Lorely Burt helped bring back Double Crewed Ambulances.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Delivers a £700 a year tax cut
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Her efforts have resulted in a £700 a year tax cut.

mentions.candidate: Lorely Burt MP: A decade of delivering for Solihull

issues.environment: Works to protect our green spaces

politicalExperience.achievements: Details are mentioned in the key policies and timeline.

images.caption: Lorely Burt with constituents and in various community settings.
